name: BUB (itch)
description:
BUB is a bubble-slurping platform puzzle game.

Each level has an "evil twin", can you solve them all?

Make and share your own levels too!

play on the web: http://bub.penduin.net
source code: https://gitlab.com/smogheap/bub

You can even play via Smile BASIC on Nintendo 3DS:
public key = 83DXN3L4
https://miiverse.nintendo.net/posts/AYMHAAACAAADVHksVo-stg
http://smilebasicsource.com/page?pid=155
